name: Project Savior (prototype)
description:
Savior (Working Title) is a game about holding on. You belong to the last surviving population in a world ravaged by beasts and horrors where you, a savior, are tasked with returning the lost ones back home. As a savior, you must find the strength to press on in the face of terror and be the guiding light for those who have lost their way.

This is a prototype and represents a work in progress. Ideas, mechanics, and visuals in this demo are subject to change.

Programming:

Devin Strehle

www.devinstrehle.com

Art/Animation:

James Strehle

www.jamiestrehle.com

Noelle Brandmier
